Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution

Class DefaultDispatcher

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.Dispatcher
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.DefaultDispatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class DefaultDispatcher
extends Dispatcher
The DefaultDispatcher class defines the default implementation of a message dispatcher. This implementation immediately sends each message directed to an actor of another actor space of the application.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • deliver

      public void deliver​(Message m)
      Forwards a message to a remote destination.
      Specified by:
      deliver in class Dispatcher
      Parameters:
      m - the message. Note that if the actor associate with the destination reference does not exist, then the possible reply is an error message.

      Error.UNREACHABLEACTOR
